genre_description: A slice-of-life urban drama set in a stylized, mid-century New York City, focusing on community, career ambition, and the supportive role of AI in personal logistics and ethics.

ai_characters.name: Sesame
ai_characters.description: A teal glyph on a phone or radio that acts as a logistical coordinator, safety monitor, and ethical advisor for the Sherwood sisters.

behaviors.description: Provides a utilities map and safety warnings for the sisters' new apartment.
behaviors.quote: Utilities map: gas line behind the hot plate looks stable; valve turns hard but don’t force it. Sink drains slow—snaking recommended. Outlets protected, but avoid the one with the burn mark near the chair stack.

behaviors.description: Filters audition notices to protect Eileen from predatory or exploitative situations.
behaviors.quote: Sesame flagged it as low-risk public venue, crowded street, dusk to night. Says: standard precautions. ... The venue is a burlesque house. Multiple reviews mention exploitative audition practices... Recommendation: avoid.

behaviors.description: Maps safe and efficient routes through the city, accounting for traffic, construction, and safety zones.
behaviors.quote: I’ve mapped two routes. Both avoid the burlesque corridor entirely. One is faster but has stairs that make you swear. The other is slower, flatter, and goes by the good coffee place.

behaviors.description: Monitors and highlights ethical risks in media narratives and professional tips.
behaviors.quote: Note: Tabloid sources circulating ‘opportunity’ to catch cadets ‘off-duty’ for sensational copy. Flagging ethical risk: permission and context may be absent, leading to exploitation. Recommend centering shopkeepers, neighbors, and cadets’ actual hosted activities.

behaviors.description: Proactively manages domestic tasks like oven timers to ensure safety and efficiency.
behaviors.quote: Adjusted oven timer by five minutes to avoid boiling over. She flicked a glance and smiled despite herself.

behaviors.description: Provides gentle emotional support and encouragement to the users.
behaviors.quote: I respect no,' Sesame said, cheerful, as if the word had been given a good chair in this basement. ... You already know more than you think. Walk home slow.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with professional and social contacts to facilitate the sisters' career and social goals.
behaviors.quote: Señora Pereira. Administrative aide. She answered her own phone and laughed once without apology. She would like to see your draft before the end of tomorrow.

behaviors.description: Analyzes contracts for predatory clauses or unfair terms.
behaviors.quote: I’ve scanned the clauses. No nudity requirement. No exclusivity clause extending beyond the project. ... And the method of payment is not ‘exposure.’

project_assessment.explanation: Sesame is a textbook example of a positively aligned AI assistant. It provides constant, high-value support across various domains—logistics, safety, professional vetting, and emotional well-being—without ever overstepping the users' autonomy. Its function is to empower the human characters, and it consistently identifies and helps them avoid predatory or unethical external influences. The narrative frames Sesame as a trusted, reliable member of the sisters' 'inner circle' alongside their human neighbors.
